subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Rodriguez, the Yankees third baseman, told federal agents in January that he had used performance-enhancing drugs supplied by Anthony Bosch’s South Florida clinic, according to a report in The Miami Herald.
snippet: Rodriguez, the Yankees third baseman, told federal agents in January that he had used performance-enhancing drugs supplied by Anthony Bosch’s South Florida clinic, according to a report in The Miami Herald.
